title: Unintended die of Keen.
content: Could someone explain me, why Keen immediately dies, when he goes into top and up borders. Is this feauture intended or a bug?[img]http://classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/images/enemyk4-wormouth.gif[/img]

title: Re: Unintended die of Keen.
content:
It's probably intentional so Keen can't just wander off the level forever if there's no tile blocking from doing so.--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Unintended die of Keen.
content:
This is indeed intentional; the program will immediately kill Keen if his position falls outside the level. If this were not to happen, Keen would be able to wander the random squiggles of off the map forever. Disabling this feature makes for some interesting viewing.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
